text:
"E' non è mai alcuna cosa sì disperata, che non vi sia qualche via da poterne sperare"

Mandragola, atto I, scena I [55]
Niccolò Machiavelli
RT @le_Parisien: Attentat de Strasbourg : «Bartek était l’exact opposé de celui qui l’a tué» https://t.co/jPAnUOaE8F
One would just need an army and an ideology. So easy! https://t.co/yjSKfIPt2Z
RT @ncweaver: When the Bitcoin hash rate drops down to the red line, Bitcoin will be neither efficient NO secure as this will be the point…
It's good to see people trying to build alternative institutions. @QuilletteM by @clairlemon is one such example. I hope @SamHarrisOrg succeeds! https://t.co/VqJifJkpz5
